basics.name: saikishan sigh thakur
basics.label: Full stack Dev
basics.summary: A Full stack developer with a 10 years of experience, played many hats, especially - A Dev, UI Manager, Architect and a Systems Engineer. Have been extensively working on many Technologies with primary focus on web - HTML, CSS, JAVASCRIPT; jQuery, React, Angular, Backbone etc

work.summary: As a UI Manager working on many UI projects across L&T Services - clients; Cisco & GE
highlights: Have lead many projects inside L&T - internal and client facing
Have developed many webapps using technologies like React, Angular and Vanilla JS
Have worked with stake holders, Product Owners and Business Leaders to understand and improve Web apps
Have brought in many best practices - code reviews, PWAs, Mobile first dev
Have introduced UI tech talks and News letters on Hybrid app development - React and ReactNative being a primary essense

work.summary: Worked as a Full stack dev and UI Manager to clients - GE, Walmart Labs and Cisco developing web applications
highlights: Developed Web apps using Technologies like React, Angular and Many JS frameworks
Wrote end to end testing and integrations tests
Involved in many design discussions and product improvements - latency management, scaling apps, migration etc
Worked to create many reusable Components & Libraries

work.summary: Started Career fresh out of college. Have worked as an Systems Engineer
highlights: Worked on PYthon code to develop the web services and Network Modules
Developed Many web and desktop softwares across HP - NNM, TeMIP, OVPI etc
Worked on many Unix and Linux environments
Worked on design and developing web apps
